scripts.build: tsc && mkdir -p dist/main/services/preprocessing/impl && cp src/main/services/preprocessing/impl/spellcheck.py dist/main/services/preprocessing/impl/ && cp src/main/services/preprocessing/impl/frequency_dictionary_en_82_765.txt dist/main/services/preprocessing/impl/ && mkdir -p dist/main/services/analysis/python && cp src/main/services/analysis/python/huggingface_classifier.py dist/main/services/analysis/python/
